backup.title: Backup account
backup.prompt: Would you like to back up sensitive trip data? You will need to enter the access PIN for each protected trip
backup.success: The account backup was completed successfully

partial.title: Backup partially completed
partial.message: One or more documents could not be backed up. If a protected data was not found, it may be due to an incorrect PIN

reason.skipped: The "{{type}}" was skipped because no access PIN was provided

restore.title: Restore account
restore.prompt: Are you sure you want to restore your account from a backup? This will overwrite your current trip data. This action cannot be undone
restore.invalid_file: The selected file is not a valid backup file
restore.incorrect_owner: The selected backup file does not belong to the current user
restore.success: The account restoration was completed successfully

delete.title: Delete account
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all associated data will also be deleted as well

trip.share: Check out my trip {{name}} created on TripViewer, starting on {{start}} and ending on {{end}}

restaurants.title: Restaurants
restaurants.description: Places that serve full meals. Perfect for lunch and dinner. Some may only open at night.

description.en: A vibrant food hall with a variety of restaurants and vendors offering diverse cuisines
description.pt: Um vibrante mercado de comida com uma variedade de restaurantes e vendedores oferecendo diversas cozinhas

snacks.title: Snacks
snacks.description: Quick-bite spots. Great for a snack, or light meal. Includes caf√©s, bakeries, and fast food places.

nightlife.title: Nightlife
nightlife.description: Bars, pubs, karaoke spots, clubs, or anything focused on drinks and entertainment.

description.en: A classic dive bar known for its cheap drinks, hot dogs, and lively atmosphere. A great spot for a casual night out

tourism.title: Tourism
tourism.description: Tourist attractions including neighborhoods, monuments, museums, squares, viewpoints, exhibitions, and more.

fields.invalid: The following required fields were not filled in:

link.title: Invalid Link {{icon}}
link.message: Make sure it starts with "http://" or "https://"

map_link.title: Invalid Map Link {{icon}}
map_link.message: The provided map link is not valid. Make sure the link starts with "http://" or "https://" and that it is from Google Maps {{googleMapsIcon}} or Apple Maps {{appleMapsIcon}}

instagram_link.title: Invalid Instagram Link {{icon}}
instagram_link.message: The provided Instagram link is not valid. Make sure the link starts with "http://" or "https://" and that it is from Instagram

twitter_link.title: Invalid Twitter Link {{icon}}
twitter_link.message: The system does not support links from Twitter / {{xIcon}}. Please use links from other platforms

media_link.title: Invalid Media Link {{icon}}
media_link.message: The provided media link is not valid. Make sure the link starts with "http://" or "https://" and that it is from YouTube {{youtubeIcon}}, TikTok {{tiktokIcon}} or Instagram Reels {{instagramIcon}}
